languages.text: "Поискать знаки солнца, начертанного синим и золотым. Так, по слухам, отмечают свое логово некие темные личности, которых прихожане Иеронимуса подозревают в ереси".

"He told us to look for sun symbols inscribed in blue and gold. Hieronymus's congregation suspects certain suspicious individuals of heresy, and rumour has it that this is how they mark their hideout."
languages.original_text: "Поискать знаки солнца, начертанного синим и золотым. Так, по слухам, отмечают свое логово некие темные личности, которых прихожане Иеронимуса подозревают в ереси".

traits.locale_text: "To look for sun symbols inscribed in blue and gold. Rumor has it that this is how some shady individuals, whom Hieronimus's parish suspects of heresy, mark their hideout."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "To look for sun symbols inscribed in blue and gold. Rumor has it that this is how some shady individuals, whom Hieronimus's parish suspects of heresy, mark their hideout."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He told us to look for sun symbols inscribed in blue and gold. Hieronymus's congregation suspects certain suspicious individuals of heresy, and rumour has it that this is how they mark their hideout."

traits.locale_text: "He told us to look for sun symbols inscribed in blue and gold. Hieronymus's congregation suspects certain suspicious individuals of heresy, and rumour has it that this is how they mark their hideout."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “他要我们寻找蓝色与金色的太阳符号。希罗尼穆斯的教众怀疑某些可疑的人是异端分子，据说那些异端分子会用这种符号来标记他们的藏身之处。”
languages.original_text: "He told us to look for sun symbols inscribed in blue and gold. Hieronymus's congregation suspects certain suspicious individuals of heresy, and rumour has it that this is how they mark their hideout."

traits.locale_text: “他要我们寻找蓝色与金色的太阳符号。希罗尼穆斯的教众怀疑某些可疑的人是异端分子，据说那些异端分子会用这种符号来标记他们的藏身之处。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Quería que buscáramos símbolos de sol inscritos en azul y dorado. La congregación de Hieronymus sospecha que hay herejes en este lugar y se rumorea que es así como marcan sus escondrijos».
languages.original_text: "He told us to look for sun symbols inscribed in blue and gold. Hieronymus's congregation suspects certain suspicious individuals of heresy, and rumour has it that this is how they mark their hideout."

traits.locale_text: «Quería que buscáramos símbolos de sol inscritos en azul y dorado. La congregación de Hieronymus sospecha que hay herejes en este lugar y se rumorea que es así como marcan sus escondrijos».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「青と金で刻まれた太陽のシンボルを探すようにと言われました。ヒエロニムスの信徒たちは、ある不審な人物を異端と疑っており、これが彼らの隠れ家の目印になっているという噂があるのです」
languages.original_text: "He told us to look for sun symbols inscribed in blue and gold. Hieronymus's congregation suspects certain suspicious individuals of heresy, and rumour has it that this is how they mark their hideout."

traits.locale_text: 「青と金で刻まれた太陽のシンボルを探すようにと言われました。ヒエロニムスの信徒たちは、ある不審な人物を異端と疑っており、これが彼らの隠れ家の目印になっているという噂があるのです」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wir sollen nach Sonnensymbolen in Blau und Gold suchen. Hieronymus' Gemeinde verdächtigt einige zwielichtige Personen der Ketzerei, und Gerüchten zufolge markieren sie so ihr Versteck."
languages.original_text: "He told us to look for sun symbols inscribed in blue and gold. Hieronymus's congregation suspects certain suspicious individuals of heresy, and rumour has it that this is how they mark their hideout."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sollen nach Sonnensymbolen in Blau und Gold suchen. Hieronymus' Gemeinde verdächtigt einige zwielichtige Personen der Ketzerei, und Gerüchten zufolge markieren sie so ihr Versteck."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Nous devons essayer de trouver des soleils bleu et or. La congrégation du révérend soupçonne certains individus louches d'hérésie, et d'après la rumeur, ils marquent leur repaire avec ces symboles. »
languages.original_text: "He told us to look for sun symbols inscribed in blue and gold. Hieronymus's congregation suspects certain suspicious individuals of heresy, and rumour has it that this is how they mark their hideout."

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons essayer de trouver des soleils bleu et or. La congrégation du révérend soupçonne certains individus louches d'hérésie, et d'après la rumeur, ils marquent leur repaire avec ces symboles. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Mavi ve altın renklerle yazılmış güneş sembollerini aramamızı söyledi. Hieronymus'un cemaati, bazı şahısların kâfirlik yoluna saptığından şüpheleniyor. Rivayete göre tarikatçılar, sığınaklarını bu sembolle işaretliyormuş."
languages.original_text: "He told us to look for sun symbols inscribed in blue and gold. Hieronymus's congregation suspects certain suspicious individuals of heresy, and rumour has it that this is how they mark their hideout."

traits.locale_text: "Altın rengi ve mavi ile işlenmiş güneş sembollerini aramamızı istedi. Hieronymus'un kurultayı, bazı şahısların kâfirlikten nasibini aldığından şüpheleniyor. Rivayete göre tarikatçılar, sığınaklarını bu sembolle işaretliyormuş."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
